title: [Wizard Guild, Courtyard]
description: An expanse of lush grass stretches north to a pair of ivy-grown gates.  Ancient trees, their shadows long in the moonlight, almost obscure a domed building to your south, its curvilinear architecture giving it the look of having grown from the land it occupies.  A winding flagstone walkway leads to the ivy-covered gates of the guild hall.

An expanse of lush grass stretches north to a pair of ivy-grown gates.  Ancient trees cast dappled shadows on a domed building to your south, its curvilinear architecture giving it the look of something grown from the land rather than an artificial construct.  A winding flagstone walkway leads to the ivy-covered gates of the guild hall.
